dataset_id: SAFARI 2000 Pre- and Post-fire Reflectance near Kaoma, Zambia, Dry Season 2000
title: SAFARI 2000 Pre- and Post-fire Reflectance near Kaoma, Zambia, Dry Season 2000
summary: The main goal of this study was to analyze the possibility of estimating combustion completeness based on fire-induced spectral reflectance changes of surface features by the development of relationships between combustion completeness and pre-fire to post-fire spectral reflectance changes, in the green, red, and near-infrared spectral domains (equivalent to Landsat ETM+ channels 2, 3, and 4).
